casebody.data:
IN RE Probate Appeal of Myrna FUMEGA-SERRANO et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 12, 2019 Myrna Fumega-Serrano, self-represented, Berta Fumega, self-represented, and Robert Fumega, self-represented, in support of the petition. Emily V. Melendez, assistant attorney general, in opposition.

The plaintiffs' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 41655) is denied.
